sentences.sContent: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.sCn: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.sContent: She died of a brain tumour .
...people like Veiseh are of great interest to neuroscientists hoping to understand the way the brain records our lives...
...Normal forgetting may even be a safety mechanism to ensure our brain doesn’t become too full...
...The brain is a seemingly endless library...
...old information is sometimes pushed out of the brain for new memories to form...
...A young woman sought explanation from a brain scientist when she noticed her unusual memory...
...our brain evolved circuits to allow us to experience sympathy...
...Research shows interaction with people is key to babies' brain development...
...But there are also other areas of impact that researchers have investigated: the effect of sugar on the brain and how liquid calories are interpreted differently by the body than solids...
...Are they exhausted by the consumer equivalent of the brain fatigue — information overload — that is caused by constant updates of devices and online media...
...Research has suggested that sugar activates the same reward pathways in the brain as traditional drugs of abuse like morphine or heroin...

phrases.pCn: 头脑风暴法，集体创造性思维法

words.tran: 聪明的；脑筋好的；有头脑的

trans.tranOther: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move
